If a dog goes to bite you, you don’t shoot it and end it’s life. If your little baby brother or sister bit you, would you shoot them certainly not (maybe in america), but yeah It’s stupid.[/quote]

item.title: Hawthorne Police Shoot and Kill Dog for Protecting Owner
item.dc:creator: @Chrix Chrix
item.description:
@Chrix wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:41, topic:523862”][quote author=Chrix link=topic=642406.msg4326961#msg4326961 date=1373089798]

i’ve been bitten by my dad’s dogs plenty of times because we were rough housing, every single dog we’ve owned (6-7) throughout my life has bit me atleast once because i put my hands on my dad

That sucks Muroth seems like you have some very bad luck with dogs, the dog usually attacks due to the person near it has some fear for the dog itself. I’d suggest buying a gun.

they love me, but put your hands on a family member the wrong way and they’ll go to town on you

I know what you’re talking about but you shouldn’t be putting your hands on your father anyways, buy a gun.
[/quote]

what? he’s a wrestling coach[/quote]

Ah I see well make sure to use protection.

Read full topic

item.title: Hawthorne Police Shoot and Kill Dog for Protecting Owner
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

How about taking the verbal abuse and letting the owner go so no one gets hurt. The dog wouldn’t have attempted to attack with his owner around, if they were pulling the owner away then the dog might attack but right there and then, no the dog looked a bit playful. Might I point out that if the dog was going to attack they would have known, it would have ran full blast without stopping.

Read full topic
item.source: Hawthorne Police Shoot and Kill Dog for Protecting Owner
